full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SLOB DPON BSHAD SGRUB MTSAN CAN GYI RNAM THAR RGYU SKAR RNAM PAR RTZE BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(SLOB DPON BSHAD SGRUB MTSAN CAN GYI RNAM THAR 'DI NI, RJE BTZUN BYANG CHUB MI LA RIN PO CHE'I DPON PO DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BKRA SHIS ZHES BYA BA RGYUD GRVAR ZHUGS NAS SNGAGS RAM PA'I MTSAN GDAGS MDZAD ZIN PA'I TSE 'DI SNYAM DU RANG LA KHA DOG BZO LTA CHEN PO MED KYANG SNGAGS PHYOGS LA THOS BSAM CUNG ZAD BYED RGYU BYUNG BA DANG, DKA' RAB 'BYAMS KYI GRVAL DU CHUD TZAM BYUNG BA 'DI YANG SLOB DPON RIN PO CHE 'DI DANG KO'U SHRIS YES RNAM GNYIS KYI THUGS RJE KHO NA YIN SNYAM PA'I DAD PA KHO NAS DRIN BZO BA'I CHED DU DPON SLOB NYID KYI RNAM THAR 'DI PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DGE BAS RGYUD PA'I 'CHAD NYAN GYI BSTAN PA DAR BA DANG, PAR DU BSKRUN PA PO NYID TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU SNGAGS SGRUB PA'I RTEN BZANG PO RIM PAR BRGYUD NAS MYUR DU RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG THOB PAR GYUR CIG , PAR GYI YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
